name: Risk-mance
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------

You're down on your luck after being evicted from your home and forced onto the streets.

Nowhere to go and no one to turn to, your only option is to accept the offer of a mysterious stranger.

Now you must court a monster - or die trying.

Pick a monster you think you'll appeal to.

Banter with them if they allow it.

Entertain their games and interests.

And most importantly: Don't get on their bad side.

This is Risk-mance. Play if you dare.

--------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Use Space Bar to flip through dialog.

The Up/Down Arrow Keys can be used to cycle choices.

QWERT Keys are needed for the rhythm mini game.

-------------------------------------------------------------
